title: "Find transition ID (alternative)"
description: "Retrieves the Transition ID associated with a given input our output ID. Input and  output IDs can be found via the associated field elements of an input or output. (alternative endpoint)"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Find transition ID (alternative)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/find/transitionID/{input_or_output_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the Transition ID associated with a given input our output ID. Input and  output IDs can be found via the associated field elements of an input or output. (alternative endpoint)


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"input_or_output_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
